text: Nordaustlandet (translates to Northeast land) is the second biggest island of Svalbard. It lies to the northeast of Spitsbergen, which is the biggest island of the group, and the only islands with permanent settlements. Northeast land is about by . It is uninhabited, and there are no settlements on it. During World War II, Germans operated a weather station. Category:Islands of Norway Category:Uninhabited islands
title: Nordaustlandet
